00001  #ifndef STXXL_META_TEMPLATE_PROGRAMMING
00002  #define STXXL_META_TEMPLATE_PROGRAMMING
00003  /***************************************************************************
00004  *            tmeta.h
00005  *  Template Metaprogramming Tools 
00006  *  (from the Generative Programming book Krysztof Czarnecki, Ulrich Eisenecker)
00007  *  Thu May 29 11:43:44 2003
00008  *  Copyright  2003  Roman Dementiev
00009  *  dementiev@mpi-sb.mpg.de

00011 #include "../common/utils.h"
00012  
00013 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00014 
00016 
00019 template <bool Flag,class Type1, class Type2>
00020 struct IF
00021 {
00022   typedef Type1 result;
00023 };
00024 
00025 template <class Type1, class Type2>
00026 struct IF<false,Type1,Type2>
00027 {
00028   typedef Type2 result;
00029 };
00030 
00031 const int DEFAULT = ~(~0u >> 1); // initialize with the smallest int
00032 
00033 struct NilCase {};
00034   
00035 template <int tag_,class Type_,class Next_ = NilCase>
00036 struct CASE
00037 {
00038   enum { tag = tag_ };
00039   typedef Type_ Type;
00040   typedef Next_ Next;
00041 };
00042 
00043 template <int tag,class Case>
00044 class SWITCH
00045 {
00046   typedef typename Case::Next NextCase;
00047   enum
00048   {
00049     caseTag = Case::tag,
00050     found   = (caseTag == tag || caseTag == DEFAULT)
00051   };
00052 public:
00053   typedef typename IF<found,
00054           typename Case::Type,
00055           typename SWITCH<tag,NextCase>::result
00056           >::result result;
00057   
00058 };
00059 
00060 template <int tag>
00061 class SWITCH<tag,NilCase>
00062 {
00063 public:
00064   typedef NilCase result;
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069 __STXXL_END_NAMESPACE
00070  
00071 #endif
